trans-unit.source: Enables the use of a custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement"></xref> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.

You should derive from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> class to use a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.
Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> instance has been created, a custom binding element is returned.

You can use this in an application configuration file by using the <`add`> element and setting the type attribute to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> class, and the name attribute to the custom binding element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"></xref> class.
Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object that represents the custom binding element.

Override and implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement.BindingElementType%2A> property to return the type of the custom binding element this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> associates with the configuration system.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object that represents the custom binding type.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a custom binding element object.
Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding element.
